name: honey
effect: Used outside of battle : Immediately triggers a wild Pokémon battle, as long as the trainer is somewhere with wild Pokémon—i.e., in tall grass, in a cave, or surfing. Can be smeared on sweet-smelling trees to attract tree-dwelling Pokémon after six hours.
flavor_text: A sweet honey collected by Pokémon. It has a lush aroma and can be sold at a low price to shops.
